artist: Designer: Richard Estes; Cutter: Tsuka-Guchi Atelier
creditline: Gift of Marlborough Graphics, New York
description: Unique set of 23 woodblock matrices for the editioned print 'Study XIII-Theater' (1997).
dimension: H.18-3/8 x W.12-5/8 x D.11/16 in. (block, each)
medium: Wood veneer over plywood printing blocks
provenance: The artist, New York; Marlborough Graphics, New York; given to MIA, 2000.
title: Set of woodblocks for 'Study XIII-Theater'
